thread.title: Becky G puts on a leggy display in jean boots in Miami | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Becky G puts on a leggy display in jean boots in Miami | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Becky G puts on a leggy display in jean boots in Miami | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Becky G was doing double duty on Wednesday. The 19-year-old rapper-singer-actress appeared in Miami to promote her new film Power Rangers while also spending to to hype the release of her first Spanish language song Sola. During her afternoon of interviews, the Inglewood, California native went for a daring ensemble that put a fashionable twist on lazy day favorites like sweatshirts and jeans. Two times the talent! Actress and musician Becky G was in Miami on Wednesday to promote the new Power Rangers film. She also spent some time hyping up her first Spanish language single, Sola, which is due out in March Standing tall! The California-born beauty looked long and lean in a quirky sweater dress she paired with daring denim boots The Empire guest star's covered her top half with a black cotton dress with cinched middle that looked like an innovative take on a simple hooded sweatshirt. Beneath the hybrid garment, the Can't Get Enough singer sported a sultry bodysuit with a cleavage accentuating center strap. On her legs, the Mexican-American talent showed off another eccentric fashion choice. Packing a punch! The 19-year-old talent turned heads in her unique outfit but kept her makeup simple with glowing skin and long lashes She wore a pair of denim boots complete with ripped knees that reached above her knees to reveal a flash of the star's upper thighs. Becky paired her quirky outfit with a classic beauty look, wearing bold eyelashes and a nude pout. Her raven hair looked lovely styled in loose waves which perfectly complimented the teenage talent's bronze skin. Rising star: Becky will take the screen as Yellow Ranger Trini Kwan in this year's highly anticipated Power Rangers reboot, which comes out March 24 Becky, whose full name is Rebbeca Marie Gomez, first made her mark online by covering popular songs for her web followers. In the upcoming Power Rangers film, the Latin beauty plays Yellow Ranger Trini Kwan alongside actors Dacre Montgomery, Naomi Scott, RJ Cyler and Ludi Lin who play her fellow superheroes. The highly anticipated Power Rangers movie hits theaters March 24 2017. Becky's Spanish language single Sola also drops late March. Share or comment on this article 120
